name: B-26B Invader (One Turret)
variantnotes: Gun-nose variant with nose and wing guns, without the lower turret, and with extra fuel (40 fuel points).
notes: Gun Turret. This variant of the B-26 is equipped with one upper remote twin .50 cal gun turrets that can fire in any direction at targets that are at the same altitude or higher. It may return fire twice per game turn in response to a gun attacks or conduct a single attack. As there is only one gunner, it may fire on only one aircraft per game turn. Roll to hit is 2/1/1 and AtA rating is 2.
